welcome to platinum hostel, ayeduase

Embrace a Vibrant Lifestyle at Platinum Hostel, Ayeduase!

about us

Welcome to Platinum Hostel, Ayeduase! Situated in Ayeduase, our branch is the second closest to campus, offering a convenient location for college students. With three room types available, we provide comfortable and modern accommodations tailored to meet your needs. Our branch boasts a well-equipped gym, basketball court, and a game room, where you can relax and unwind after a busy day of studies. At Platinum Hostel, Ayeduase, we strive to create a welcoming environment that promotes both personal growth and community engagement.

rooms

1 in a room

Discover a haven of tranquility and focus in our one-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Ayeduase. Stay connected with WiFi, enjoy personalized climate control with air conditioning, indulge in entertainment with DSTV cable, and rejuvenate yourself with a refreshing shower, all within the comfort of your private space.

2 in a room

Share college memories and experiences with a roommate in our inviting two-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Ayeduase. Experience the convenience of WiFi, the comfort of air conditioning, the entertainment options of DSTV cable, and the refreshment of a private shower, creating an ideal environment for shared growth and friendship.

3 in a room

Embrace a vibrant community lifestyle in our three-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Ayeduase. Connect with fellow students while enjoying essential amenities such as WiFi, air conditioning, DSTV cable, and a dedicated shower area, all designed to foster collaboration, friendship, and personal development.

amenites and facilities

air conditioning

Enjoy a comfortable stay with air-conditioned rooms.

comfortable beds

Experience a good night's sleep in our cozy and comfortable beds.

free WIFI

Stay connected with complimentary high-speed WiFi available throughout the hostel.

DSTV cable

Relax and unwind with a wide range of entertainment options on DSTV cable.

gym

Stay active and energized with our state-of-the-art gym facilities.

parking lot

Conveniently park your vehicle in our secure parking area.

back-up generator

Experience uninterrupted power supply with our reliable standby generator.

well-stocked supermarket

Find all your essentials and more at our well-stocked on-site supermarket.

housekeeping

Enjoy a clean and well-maintained environment with our dedicated housekeeping services.
